Title: Authorizes an increase in the maximum speed limit for travel on certain roadways
Summary: Authorizes an increase in the maximum speed limit to 70 mph for travel on roadways that currently have a maximum speed limit of 65 mph.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing an increase in the maximum speed limit for travel on certain roadways
